tool_description: This API helps you proactively defend against Domain generation algorithms (DGAs) threat.  It uses machine learning to analyze DGA, determines whether a domain  is likely to have been generated by a machine, rather than a person,  by reverse-engineering and analyzing other frequently used techniques  found in DGAs.
name: Domain Generation Algorithm(DGA) Detection API
title: Domain Generation Algorithm(DGA) Detection API

api_list.name: Domain Generation Algorithm(DGA) Detection API
api_list.description:
This API helps you proactively defend against Domain generation algorithms (DGAs) threat. 
It uses machine learning to analyze DGA, determines whether a domain 
is likely to have been generated by a machine, rather than a person, 
by reverse-engineering and analyzing other frequently used techniques 
found in DGAs.
